promotion.title: Join DORAL & Co. Today!
promotion.message: We want to say thanks for choosing Doral. So, we're offering this chance to receive Doral & Co., our exclusive FREE publication for Doral smokers like you. Doral & Co. contains lots of exclusive offers that we think you'll enjoy.

offer.title: Get Free Cartons For Only 70 Pack Seals Through Our Free Carton Offer
offer.eligibility: OFFER RESTRICTED TO SMOKERS 21 YEARS OF AGE OR OLDER.
offer.instructions: Want delivered to you? Just send in this card and you'll be eligible!
offer.warning: SURGEON GENERAL'S WARNING: Smoking By Pregnant Women May Result in Fetal Injury, Premature Birth, And Low Birth Weight.

survey.instructions: Complete the survey below and be sure to include your birthdate and signature. Surveys must be received by 1/30/97.
survey.note: SURVEYS WILL NOT BE PROCESSED WITHOUT SIGNATURE AND BIRTHDATE.
